tabs.content:
// 1. Create Table (Matches Stream Data Schema)
.create table StreamBookingRaw (
    booking_id: string,
    customer_id: long,
    hotel_id: long,
    booking_date: datetime,
    room_type: string,
    total_amount: real,
    currency: string,
    source_system: string,
    ingestion_time: datetime
)

// 2. Create JSON Mapping (Map JSON fields to Table columns)
.create table StreamBookingRaw ingestion json mapping "StreamMapping"
'['
'    {"column":"booking_id", "path":"$.booking_id"},'
'    {"column":"customer_id", "path":"$.customer_id"},'
'    {"column":"hotel_id", "path":"$.hotel_id"},'
'    {"column":"booking_date", "path":"$.booking_date"},'
'    {"column":"room_type", "path":"$.room_type"},'
'    {"column":"total_amount", "path":"$.total_amount"},'
'    {"column":"currency", "path":"$.currency"},'
'    {"column":"source_system", "path":"$.source_system"},'
'    {"column":"ingestion_time", "path":"$.ingestion_time"}'
']'

// 3. Batching Policy (Optional - Low latency for Real-Time Dashboard)
.alter table StreamBookingRaw policy ingestionbatching 
```{"MaximumBatchingTimeSpan": "00:00:10", "MaximumNumberOfItems": 500, "MaximumRawDataSizeMB": 1024}```

// 4. Verify
// .show tables
// .show table StreamBookingRaw policy ingestionbatching

StreamBookingRaw
| count
tabs.title: Tab
